item.title: Air Peace vs. SmartLynx: Wetin Dey Happen for Our Air Travel?!
item.description:
Sodiq breaks down the messy dispute between Air Peace and SmartLynx Airlines, where Air Peace reportedly lost $38 million after SmartLynx pulled out four leased aircraft. This episode dives into how this wahala is affecting flight schedules, Air Peace's reputation, and Nigeria's entire travel industry, with a raw, street-smart take on the situation.
Hosts: Host: Sodiq (Street)
Category: Travel

item.title: Wahala For Who Wan Fly: Local Flights Hit N300K For Yuletide!
item.description:
This episode of Samony Podcast spills the hot gist on the astronomical jump in local flight prices in Nigeria, with one-way tickets hitting over N300,000 for the Yuletide season. Sodiq and MamaT dissect the shocking increase, the dilemma of choosing between expensive flights and dangerous road travel, and the 'wahala' facing Nigerians trying to travel home for the holidays.
Hosts: Host: Sodiq (Street), Co-Host: Mama-Tee (Gossip)
Category: Travel

item.title: Unlocking Africa: The Push for Easier Visas to Boost Continental Travel
item.description:
This episode delves into the recent Heirs Travel Festival, where diplomats and experts passionately advocated for simplified visa processes and stronger bilateral agreements across Africa. Hosts Charon and Musa discuss the economic potential of seamless continental travel, the irony of current restrictions, and the urgent need for political will to foster a truly integrated African experience.
Hosts: Host: Charon, Co-Host: Musa (Sport)
Category: Travel
